entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:10 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -41.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 07:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -41.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -45.6°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 42.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 42. Wind chill minus 61 this morning and minus 53 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 46.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 46. Wind chill near minus 60. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
